TITLE: Episode 143 - Good News Tonight with Brad Binkley
DESCRIPTION: It's the end of the month. There's so much bad news floating around, we thought it would be a good time to talk about some good news. So, we're going to talk about good things, unwind, and shoot the breeze. You should join us.
